Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' followed by 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' leading to 'Request Payment'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' in cases with amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all approval activities
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases where '' does not happen

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' that are preceded by 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' followed by 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' in relation to total declarations submitted
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' in successful payment requests
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' in cases that required director approval
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average number of days from 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' in cases with travel expenses reimbursed within two months after the trip
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage reduction of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' after implementing changes
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' over 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' by month to identify peak periods
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities
